text: Tulsi Gowda ( - 16 December 2024) was an Indian environmentalist. She was born in Honnāli, British India. In 2021, she was honored with the Padma Shri. Gowda was known as the "Encyclopedia of the Forest" because she was able to recognise the mother tree of any species of tree. Gowda died on 16 December 2024, at her home in Honnāli, Karnataka at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Indian environmentalists Category:People from Karnataka
title: Tulsi Gowda
